entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of light snow this morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
